resources.string: How many new sentences per day do you want to learn? Don\'t forget that you will also be reviewing previous days\' sentences as well!
The playback speed for the target language. Range from 0.5 to 2.5.
You aren\'t currently studying any courses, please create a course!
You haven\'t loaded any languages yet, please load a language pack (or two)!
The pack is incomplete, it\'s missing the sentence text file!
This language is not yet supported!
There was an error opening the file!
Pause course when you open the individual course settings screen.
Are you sure you want to delete? This cannot be undone.
Individual course settings have not been implemented yet, sorry!
The amount of time in milliseconds to wait between each sentence.
Please add a book to your course first by clicking on it!
Select where in the course you\'d like to start from if you\'ve previously studied the course or are familiar with the language.
This will reset your current session, are you sure?
If you\'ve already started a course, you don\'t need to start from scratch. Select the sentence you would like to start with.
Create a custom pattern. Separate each day\'s reps by a space ( ), comma (,), or slash (/), e.g. \'5 4 3 2 1\', \'5,4,3,2,1\', or \'5/4/3/2/1\'.
This is the standard schedule for studying 16+ sentenceGroups per day. Similar to above but starts at 7 reps per sentence on the first day. You will see each sentence 21 times.

This is the standard schedule for studying 1–15 sentenceGroups per day. The first day you will see each new sentence 6 times, the next day 4, then 3, and the last day you will see each sentence twice. In total, you will practice each sentence 15 times.
How many days will you study each sentence and how many times each day will you study them?

If enabled, you will hear the target language twice instead of once. \"All\" sets it for all sentences, \"New sentences\" only sets it the first session a sentence is shown. This can be changed later, however sentenceGroups that have already been studied one way will remain like that for all reviews.
